sentences.translation: I am looking forward to the winter vacation.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我在寒假期间计划去滑雪，这将是我第一次尝试这项运动。
sentences.traditionalText: 我在寒假期間計劃去滑雪，這將是我第一次嘗試這項運動。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zài hánjià qījiān jìhuà qù huáxuě, zhè jiāng shì wǒ dì yī cì chángshì zhè xiàng yùndòng.
sentences.translation: I plan to go skiing during the winter vacation, it will be my first time trying this sport.
